column4: Hi, can anyone help me connect to my office's server, I can't figure out the GUI menu for it.
I have an IP for the server, with a username and pw for the account on the server.
is there an ssh server running or what else?
or have you tried to point your brower to that ip?
tried on firefix, didnt load anything
if you do not know how to connect to it, you might want to try a port scan on it :-)  ... but make sure that you do not get blocked completely
It seems like there should be a simple solution for this.  The only point of this server is for remote login.
remote login meaning what if not shell (telnet or ssh)?  is there some special windows server program running you did not mention or vnc?
have you tried to access it with the file browser via places > connect to server?
I cant figure out what to type in to the connect to server menu.  There is no password option in any of the choices.
i think it will ask you for a password at a later step
I've been trying, It keeps failing.
does it ask you for a password?
no, it just says "could not open ftp://editors@ip [break] service not available
i do not know the english term, but i assume you chose "windows share"?
public FTP, private FTP and windows share
I got the server mounted on the windows option for "connect to server," but I can't display any content because i didn't get a password prompt
